code: import'../App.css';import{getTypeColor}from'./utils';import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PokemonCard(_ref){let{pokemon}=_ref;const backgroundColor=getTypeColor(pokemon.types);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pokemon-card",style:{backgroundColor},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/pokemon/".concat(pokemon.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:pokemon.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PokeAPI/sprites/master/sprites/pokemon/".concat(pokemon.id,".png"),alt:pokemon.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Type: ",pokemon.types?pokemon.types.map(type=>type.type.name).join(', '):'Unknown']})]})});}export default PokemonCard;
